Greeting.1: Make your buisiness quick. I have no time for your games.
Greeting.3: What do you want from me?
Greeting.5: E ku abo, Shango. How have you been?.

Tell Origin.1: I came to Aye from the spirit world in order to foster peace in the land.
Tell Origin.2: I came to Aye from the spirit world in order to foster peace in the land.
Tell Origin.3: I came to Aye from the spirit world in order to foster peace in the land.
Tell Origin.4: I came to Aye from the spirit world in order to foster peace in the land.
Tell Origin.5: I came to Aye from the spirit world in order to foster peace in the land.

Tell About Strength Of.1: HERO is a weakling that has no ability to defend themself or others.
Tell About Strength Of.2: HERO is a weak person that can barely defend themself.
Tell About Strength Of.3: HERO is a capable person who can defend themself and their people.
Tell About Strength Of.4: HERO is a great individual with vast strength.
Tell About Strength Of.5: HERO has enough strength to take down anyone, or to protect anybody.

Ask About Affinity Of.1: I know that someone like you probably knows nothing I already do not, but how likable is HERO?
Ask About Affinity Of.2: I doubt you can enlighten me, but how friendly is HERO?
Ask About Affinity Of.3: How much of an agreeable person is HERO?
Ask About Affinity Of.4: How much of an agreeable person is HERO?
Ask About Affinity Of.5: How much of an agreeable person is HERO?

Tell About Affinity Of.1: HERO is that horrible person that is always up to no good.
Tell About Affinity Of.2: HERO is someone that has made too many enemies for themself.
Tell About Affinity Of.3: HERO is a person that is likable enough.
Tell About Affinity Of.4: HERO is someone that a multitude of people think well of. Myself included.
Tell About Affinity Of.5: HERO is someone that a multitude of people think well of. Myself included.

Ask About Notoriety Of.1: I know that someone like you probably knows nothing I already do not, but how well known is HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.2: Since you so decided to show up in my presence unnanounced, how about you make yourself useful? What is the level of renown of HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.3: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.4: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.5: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO?

Tell About Notoriety Of.1: HERO is a nobody with very few accomplishments.
Tell About Notoriety Of.2: HERO is an individual of little importance with only a few minor accomplishments.
Tell About Notoriety Of.3: HERO is known as a capable person that has earned the favor of some.
Tell About Notoriety Of.4: HERO is known as a champion of the people and as a person of great strength and fortitude.
Tell About Notoriety Of.5: HERO is known far and wide as a hero amongst heroes and many people sing of their achievements.

Ask_To_Form_Alliance.1: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.2: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.3: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.4: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.5: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?

Accept Alliance Offer.4: That seems like a good idea for the both of us.
Accept Alliance Offer.5: Of course. With our might combined, we will surely prosper!

Confirm Alliance.1: If you need my assistance, don't hesitate to ask.
Confirm Alliance.2: If you need my assistance, don't hesitate to ask.
Confirm Alliance.3: If you need my assistance, don't hesitate to ask.
Confirm Alliance.4: If you need my assistance, don't hesitate to ask.
Confirm Alliance.5: If you need my assistance, don't hesitate to ask.

Advise To Conquer.1: I would like you to consider conquering HERO.
Advise To Conquer.2: I think it would be greatly beneficial to you if you gained control over HERO.
Advise To Conquer.3: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO.
Advise To Conquer.4: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO.
Advise To Conquer.5: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO.

Take Advice To Conquer.1: Why should I take your advice?
Take Advice To Conquer.2: I don't think conquest is a wise move at this juncture.
Take Advice To Conquer.3: If that's what it takes to bring this land peace, then so be it.
Take Advice To Conquer.4: I'll take your advice. Conquest seems like a viable stategy.

Advise To Ally With.1: I believe it would be beneficial to you if you ally with HERO.
Advise To Ally With.2: I feel like you would be a perfect candidate for an alliance with HERO.
Advise To Ally With.3: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO.
Advise To Ally With.4: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO.
Advise To Ally With.5: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO.

Take Advice To Ally With.1: HERO!? I absolutely refuse. The very idea of being in an alliance with their village disgusts me.
Take Advice To Ally With.2: HERO as an ally? An alliance can possibly help ensure the safety of this village, so I will definitely consider it.
Take Advice To Ally With.3: HERO as an ally? Alright, I'll give it a try... this time.
Take Advice To Ally With.4: An alliance with HERO seems like it would benefit us all. Ill take your advice.
Take Advice To Ally With.5: If you believe that that is the best course of action, then I will trust your judgement.

Advise To Revolt Against.1: I think it would be in your best interests to revolt against HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.2: I cannot stand see you under the oppression of another. You must break free of HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.3: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.4: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.5: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO

Take Advice To Revolt Against.1: HERO has gone too far, but do you honestly think I would take advice on such an important matter from someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.2: HERO has gone too far, I do not think I should be discussing this with someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.3: HERO is not very tolerant and it seems very risky to even be talking about this, but I cannot say that I haven't considered revolt.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.4: HERO being gone would help this village prosper, but it just seems so dangerous. I will have to think about this.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.5: HERO will control my people no further! I know you are right. This tyranny can last no longer. The only possible solution I can think of is revolt.

Advise To Destroy.1: I feel like it would most certainly be in your best interests to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.2: I feel like it is a good idea for you to destroy nuisances like HERO
Advise To Destroy.3: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.4: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.5: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO

Take Advice To Destroy.1: HERO!? You are suggesting I destroy them!? It is possible that this village would be safer if that village was out of the picture entirely. But I know that it is risky.
Take Advice To Destroy.2: HERO is not someone that will be easy to get rid of, but I am not someone to back down from a challenge if the safety of this village is on the line.
Take Advice To Destroy.3: I guess you're right. HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but I know this cannot be avoided.
Take Advice To Destroy.4: You're right. I was on the fence until now, but destruction is inevitable.
Take Advice To Destroy.5: Your counsel is always well thought-out and in my best interest. I will conquer HERO.

Ask_To_Duel.1: I am looking for an easy duel to loosen up a bit. Wanna go at it?
Ask_To_Duel.2: Duel me. I doubt someone of your caliber could even keep up.
Ask_To_Duel.3: I am looking for a respectable duel. Are you prepared.
Ask_To_Duel.4: I cannot think of a better warrior to test my mettle against. I challenge you to a duel.
Ask_To_Duel.5: I cannot think of a better warrior to test my mettle against. I challenge you to a duel.

Accept Duel.3: Alright, lets see how strong you really are then.
Accept Duel.5: You will regret challenging me. I accept your duel.

Confirm Duel.1: Come at me whenever you're ready.
Confirm Duel.2: Come at me whenever you're ready.
Confirm Duel.3: Come at me whenever you're ready.
Confirm Duel.4: Come at me whenever you're ready.
Confirm Duel.5: Come at me whenever you're ready.

Finish Duel.1: Next time I won't be so lenient.

Finish Duel.3: Next time I won't be so lenient.
Finish Duel.4: Next time I won't be so lenient.
Finish Duel.5: Next time I won't be so lenient.

Ask_To_Spar.3: I believe that sparring would be beneficial to the both of us. What say you?

Ask_To_Spar.5: I believe that sparring would be beneficial to the both of us. What say you?

Accept Spar Request.1: Sparring with you is akin to battling a toddler. I refuse.
Accept Spar Request.3: Alright. I don't see why not.
Accept Spar Request.4: Sparring seems like a grand idea. I accept.
Accept Spar Request.5: Sparring seems like a grand idea. I accept.

Confirm Spar.1: Don't hold back now. Show your teeth.

Confirm Spar.3: Don't hold back now. Show your teeth.
Confirm Spar.4: Don't hold back now. Show your teeth.

Finish Spar.1: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.

Finish Spar.3: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.
Finish Spar.4: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.

Accept Bribe.4: Sure, I give you my thanks.
Accept Bribe.5: If it's from you, then it must be an amazing gift indeed.

Ask_To_Join_Party.1: Would you be willing to allow me to join you?
Ask_To_Join_Party.2: I would greatly appreciate if you would allow me to stand by your side.
Ask_To_Join_Party.3: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.4: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.5: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.

Response_Recruit_For_Party.1: I refuse to join your ranks.
Response_Recruit_For_Party.3: Alright. travelling together is not a bad idea.
Response_Recruit_For_Party.4: I will join, for the sake of both of our fates.
Response_Recruit_For_Party.5: Glady! Our might shall be unstoppable!

Accept Into Party.1: I would rather group up with a toad.
Accept Into Party.5: Of course. I would be honored for you to stand at my side.

Recruit_For_Party.1: Would you like to join my party?
Recruit_For_Party.2: My party could use a mind like yours. Would you care to join?
Recruit_For_Party.3: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.4: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.5: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.

Join Party.1: I refuse to join your ranks.
Join Party.3: Alright. travelling together is not a bad idea.
Join Party.4: I will join, for the sake of both of our fates.
Join Party.5: Glady! Our might shall be unstoppable!

Compliment.1: I can tell that you have many great qualities.
Compliment.2: That's a nice sword you have there. Fit for a warrior.
Compliment.3: You seem like a capable individual.
Compliment.5: Your ferocity and strength of will is unlike any I have seen.

Thank.1: Your words do no move my heart in the slightest.
Thank.5: I do not hold myself in such high regard, but your honesty is laudable.

Grovel.1: You seem like the type of person whose charm attracts many followers.
Grovel.2: Your strength with a sword is admirable.
Grovel.3: You have the aura of a leader about you.
Grovel.4: Your strength is truly that of lightning and thunder incarnate.
Grovel.5: You, my friend, are truly worthy of all of the attention you garner.

Accept Plea.1: Do you think I am unaware of my own greatness?
Accept Plea.3: You words are too kind. I'm not that great.
Accept Plea.4: I appreciate your sense of respect.
Accept Plea.5: Thank you, your praise honors me.

Advise To Train With.1: I believe that your village would be safer if you trained its troops with HERO.
Advise To Train With.2: I think that it should be a high priority for you to train with HERO.
Advise To Train With.3: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO.
Advise To Train With.4: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO.
Advise To Train With.5: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO.

Take Advice To Train With.1: HERO!? Train me? I believe I know when I should train the village and its soldiers. I do not need your advice.
Take Advice To Train With.2: HERO!? Train me? Are you implying that this village is weak? I think I know how strong they are more than you do.
Take Advice To Train With.3: HERO? Train me? Hmm. It cannot hurt to always be a bit more prepared. I will try it out.
Take Advice To Train With.4: HERO? Train me? I do worry about whether we are prepared for an attack or not. Ok.
Take Advice To Train With.5: HERO? Train me? I know you're right. This village is vulnerable in its current state. HERO's guidance will surely be useful.

Advise To Fight.1: I believe it would be prudent of you to fight HERO.
Advise To Fight.2: I think fighting with HERO could be beneficial to you.
Advise To Fight.3: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.
Advise To Fight.4: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.
Advise To Fight.5: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.

Take Advice To Fight.1: A fight with HERO would be unwise.
Take Advice To Fight.2: I dont think that's a good idea right now.
Take Advice To Fight.3: Fight HERO? I'll take your advice... this time.
Take Advice To Fight.4: Alright, I will act on your advice.
Take Advice To Fight.5: If you believe that fighting HERO is neccessary for peace, then I will trust your judgement.

Advise To Send Peace Offering To.1: I believe it would be prudent of you to send a peace offering to HERO.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.2: You should send a peace offering to HERO in order to earn their favor.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.3: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.4: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.5: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.

Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.1: My apologies, but I do not think your advice is worth acting on.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.2: Your advice is not bad, but I am not sure that you are trustworthy so I won't act on your word.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.3: I suppose that is one way of achieving peace. I will try it.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.4: Alright, since you reccomend it, I will give diplomacy a shot.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.5: I will trust our judgement this.

Request_Teaching.1: I would like to be taught by you.
Request_Teaching.2: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.3: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.4: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.5: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.

Teach.1: Teach you. Ha ha. That's a good one kid.
Teach.2: I'm not teaching you a thing.
Teach.3: I ain't one to take students, but I like your guts. I'll teach you.
Teach.4: Hmm. I guess you are worthy to learn from me. Let's get started with this lesson.
Teach.5: I know someone like you would put my powerful skill to good use. I'll teach it to you immediately.

Already Taught.4: I have nothing else to teach you at present.

Offer_Teaching.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt.
Offer_Teaching.4: Please allow me to teach you. It would be mutually beneficial.
Offer_Teaching.5: I would love to teach you. I can probably learn some things myself by teaching you.

Accept Teaching.1: Hahaha I honestly would rather be taught by a rat than the likes of you.
Accept Teaching.2: I doubt you could teach me anything.
Accept Teaching.3: Oh, I suppose being taught by you could not hurt.
Accept Teaching.4: I would be more than happy to accept your teaching.
Accept Teaching.5: I gladly accept your offer. I would love to be taught by someone like you.
